column5: Howdy. Anybody know of Central air installers for rural Eastern Ontario.,specifically Arden area. We'd like to get it done as soon as possible to avoid rush. Recommend? Thanks.

Can't help with a recomendation but we had a really bad experience with Enbridge, botched instalation, spent months trying to get them to fix it, finally had it removed and had one installed by another supplier. Best bet is talk to some of your neighbors and find out who did theirs.

Howdy. Anybody know of Central air installers for rural Eastern Ontario.,specifically Arden area. We'd like to get it done as soon as possible to avoid rush. Recommend? Thanks. Might be a good idea to do some reading and research, check warranty too.  http://www.classaction.org/goodman-amana-lawsuit
